gov.nist.secauto.decima.xml.util

Class XSLTransformer

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.nist.secauto.decima.xml.util.XSLTransformer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    URIResolver
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExtendedXSLTransformer

    public class XSLTransformer
extends Object
implements URIResolver
    Provides support for XSL transformations in Decima.

    For XSL transformations in Decima, the ExtendedXSLTransformer should be used. This guarantees that any XSL extensions are properly loaded through the TransformerExtensionService extension mechanism in the Decima framework.
